name: TRORB (Froglake Studios, Circulito, Marcachofa, Geri, Rugi Kong)
name_original: TRORB (Froglake Studios, Circulito, Marcachofa, Geri, Rugi Kong)
description:
A game made for the ListJam2 on newgrounds in under 3 days.

Survive in these cold ruins until the door opens while the orb you hold changes your movement and route as an unstoppable ghost pursues you.

Credits

Character Artist - Marc Batlle (twitter)

Environment Artist - Roger Galbarro (twitter)

Programmer - Gerard Gascón (twitter)

Musician - Pedro Astasio (twitter)
